description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2diuc","text":"Basic steps and scripts used for translating text citations to bibtex files suitable for loading into citation management software or citation analysis scripts. 4 publically available webpage mounted scripts are suggested, that require no programming.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj7be","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epr5v","text":"Updated in April 2023 to include a ChatGPT option","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4rngv","text":"Copy citations from the source document(s) into a text (.txt) document.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44ojr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1gvg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"af59b","text":"The Preparation steps are not required to use ChatGPT (step 3.4) to produce bibtex, but may produce cleaner output.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kk2m","text":"Edit the text document so that each citation is on a separate line with one blank line between each citation. Not all the scripts require a blank line between citations, but it does improve readability and importing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"249bf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0gmp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6d5p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"s5ve","text":"A text editor that includes line numbers (the type used by software programmers) makes this step easier.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9shfs","text":"I've found 4 web-mounted scripts that will do text file to bibtex file translation. Only one is needed to produce a bib file - different text citation formats may work better in different systems, however.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c5pb","text":"Once the script has exported a .bib file, load it into your citation manager of choice. Zotero has been the most reliable for importing. Zotero also has an option to \"Import from Clipboard\" if the output is available for copy \u0026 paste.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hibf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df6uc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16r59","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"49ed8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"software","mutability":"","data":{"can_edit":1,"developer":"Zotero","guid":"C51240E0F38111EABC220755C1855DBA","id":1118,"link":"http://www.zotero.org","name":"Zotero","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"repository":null,"version":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1vskv","text":"Zotero also produces more standardized .bib and .ris files than the scripts, especially the older scripts. I have imported into Zotero, exported a bib file, and imported into other software if a direct import didn't work.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejsh1","text":"Anystyle.io can be used on the web, or as a Ruby script. This is the most flexible script and it allows detailed editing before the final file export. The website is privately hosted, so it's not always been available. https://anystyle.io/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":219,"length":20}],"data":{}},{"key":"2iv0t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eot4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhk53","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8v6as","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"914C8C96DE2E11EDBD860A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://anystyle.io"}},"1":{"type":"software","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"developer":"Sylvester Keil, inukshuk on github","guid":"0F1BBBC0DE2711EDB8062F62C8627A17","id":1115,"link":"https://anystyle.io/","name":"Anystyle.io","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"repository":"https://github.com/inukshuk/anystyle","version":null}},"2":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2fc48","text":".bib file","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9f8po","text":"This PERL script is mounted on a website and will do basic translation. No support, but it's quite good. http://www.snowelm.com/~t/doc/tips/makebib.perl.cgi","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":51}],"data":{}},{"key":"1iuj0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3clvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eln8j","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aaqv4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"815A3C3CDE2E11EDBD860A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.snowelm.com/~t/doc/tips/makebib.perl.cgi"}},"1":{"type":"software","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"developer":"Makino Takaki","guid":"407D2EB0DE2711EDB8062F62C8627A17","id":1116,"link":"http://www.snowelm.com/~t/doc/tips/makebib.en.html","name":"makebib.perl script","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"repository":null,"version":null}},"2":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elu65","text":".bib file","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fqtm","text":"Hosted by the University of Toronto. Requires registration. Basic editing and checking in Google Scholar is available. Accurate and reliable. https://text2bib.economics.utoronto.ca/","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":39}],"data":{}},{"key":"ad7mj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctskj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ckufj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gun5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"56ojt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9E00D995DE2E11EDBD860A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://text2bib.economics.utoronto.ca"}},"1":{"type":"software","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"developer":"J. O. Martin and Fabian Qifei Bai","guid":"5B3C1B30DE2711EDB8062F62C8627A17","id":1117,"link":"https://text2bib.economics.utoronto.ca/","name":"Text2Bib","os_name":null,"os_version":null,"repository":null,"version":null}},"2":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8uf22","text":".bib file","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cllsv","text":"ChatGPT can take text citations, even with errors or in non-standard formats, and format them as bibtex with high accuracy. While it is not required to process the text as much as for the other services, it may make it easier to be sure you are getting the correct number of fully formatted citations. The following prompt has worked well, but variations should work as well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hc35","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d502n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hmvv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"oqcv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lo4c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hd78","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ton4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32s90","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd2tt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kmum","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bb7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l0a6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":1,"command_name":"ChatGPT Produce bibtex","description":"ChatGPT prompt for producing bibtex formatting from text citations","guid":"CD2670A0DE2811EDB8062F62C8627A17","id":11517,"name":"\"Generate bibtex formatting for the following citations. Put all the bibtex in one place for easier copying.\" Paste the citations following the prompt. ","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"1":{"type":"software","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"developer":"OpenAI","guid":null,"id":1574,"link":"","name":"ChatGPT","os_name":"","os_version":"","repository":"https://chat.open.ai","version":"3.5"}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"46beq","text":"Directing ChatGPT to put all the bibtex in \"one place\" stops it from producing individual entries that must be copied separately. This also seems to prevent it from stalling out partway through the citation list.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6p8q5","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5do1r","text":"There are word/character limits in most versions of ChatGPT, so it's necessary to break up large lists into smaller numbers of citations.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"3":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dhv26","text":"The output is in ChatGPT's code output. In the web version of ChatGPT (as opposed to the API), there is a Copy Code at the top of the code block. The copied text can be added to a text file for later importing into citation managers or imported into Zotero using the Import from Clipboard option.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: Collecting Citations from Text
